body: I wish there was more sex stories with kusano, hell just more pics with kusano, it's so rare seeing anything dealing with her it's nuts

Man I was really hoping for some Kusano action. I mean the moment was set up perfectly and while I don't mind how it ended I was really looking forward to something that hasn't been done for this character. I mean theres everything for anyone else, but for Kuu? Nothing. Not like I don't understand why since of the age but the fact that it has never been done before makes it interesting to see (pretty much the only reason). I really hope you make another one with this character. Keep up the good work!
